attributes.title: Working with the team at G2 has been a pleasure from day one

love.text: What do you like best about the product?
love.value: The fact that all the reports are vetted and verified by G2 gives credibility to the badges and reports. When a prospect or customer wants to research our service, we feel confident pointing them to G2 for reliable and honest info about our product. The team is also really helpful and supportive, providing plenty of ideas and examples of how we can use the content.

hate.text: What do you dislike about the product?
hate.value: Nothing really comes to mind about the Marketing Solutions themselves, but gathering reviews is key to the success of the marketing material, and some customers express that writing a review can be time-consuming, so that's one thing I guess I can say I dislike. That said, having a slightly higher threshold for review writers is what ensures they're real and credible, so I probably wouldn't want to change it even if it's a bit of a hurdle for some.

benefits.text: What problems is the product solving and how is that benefiting you?
benefits.value: A lot of people researching our category use G2 to help inform their decision, and being able to reference comparison reports and reviews means we don't have to do all the talking ourselves. Our Sales and Marketing teams can point people to what others are saying about us instead of only saying it themselves. We also use Buyer Intent data to help understand what types of companies and industries our platform is most relevant for, and who is interested in our service. This gives us valuable insight and intel we wouldn't otherwise have access to.

attributes.title: The best way to collect customer feedback

love.text: What do you like best about the product?
love.value: G2 allows us to collect customer feedback, better understand the market, and develop our product based on it. We also use the buyer intent features to support our outbound sales efforts. The CSM team has been extremely helpful and responsive in supporting us with review campaigns, onboarding, and any of our questions. They regularly go above and beyond to get our questions answered quickly.

hate.text: What do you dislike about the product?
hate.value:
Because the scoring algorithm for the grid and rankings change all the time, it's sometimes difficult to keep track of all the things we could be doing to perform better in the reports. However, the CSM team has done a great job keeping us up to date on the important changes.

The other thing I'd love would be the ability to control what data/new accounts we move to HubSpot through the integration. In its current shape, the integration is a bit noisy.

benefits.text: What problems is the product solving and how is that benefiting you?
benefits.value: G2 helps us collect useful customer feedback that allows us to understand our product gaps and the market we're in. The buyer intent data gives us valuable information on prospects who are considering different solutions and may not even know about our product yet.

attributes.title: Poor quality data and lack of support

love.text: What do you like best about the product?
love.value: The reviews aspect of G2 is quite good. It is a useful way to gain feedback for our Customer Success Team, although an internal, more affordable system would likely suffice.

hate.text: What do you dislike about the product?
hate.value:
The intent data is often incorrect or irrelevant. There seems to be a number of issues with the platform over the past several months where the dashboard doesn't work properly and provides inconsistent data.
The dashboard often ignores our ICP/Vertical settings and provides data on irrelevant companies. This causes issues with our ABM strategy.
G2's Customer Success/Relationship Team are unhelpful and have litle to no understanding of their own platform. They often make promises to follow up on our issues but never do. 
Recently our Customer Success and Relationship Managers dumped us and passed us on to a new Manager who has not taken any time to work with us.

benefits.text: What problems is the product solving and how is that benefiting you?
benefits.value:
It is really only helping us generate Customer reviews, which is nice but not for the hefty fee that comes with G2.
The marketing/intent side of the platform does not work correctly, and there is little to no help in resolving these problems.

love.text: What do you like best about the product?

Unlike other review websites, G2 is very user-friendly, innovative, and brings us as a software vendor a lot of creditability by our customers and prospects. I also love working with our account managers at g2, everyone is very involved, thinking with us, and very helpful!

hate.text: What do you dislike about the product?
hate.value: The G2 algorithm that calculates your Market Presence Scoring is a bit 'blurry'. It is quite challenging to directly influence this and your position on the G2 grid. Your score or position on the grid can also vary from day to day.

benefits.text: What problems is the product solving and how is that benefiting you?
benefits.value: Our profile on G2 is very useful in the buying process of our prospects. In my opinion, third-party references are very valuable to share and showcase. G2 is also a great addition for our sales department to leverage in the sales and account management process.

attributes.title: Great Affiliate Marketing Tool, Questionable Ranking Methodology

love.text: What do you like best about the product?
love.value: G2 has a very strong and well-established name within the SaaS 'affiliate' space and therefore has become a synonymous place for potential clients to research software solutions and explore comparisons between alternates. The backend CMS is well defined and offers great tools to track and monitor prospects from both an ABM and brand point of view. They also provide the all-important "gamification" or g2 badges that have become a representation of trust in the greater market.

hate.text: What do you dislike about the product?
hate.value: It's not one size fits all, and even though the g2 matrix has been developed in such a way that no matter where you are in the grid it is viewed as a 'positive' however this is not the case externally as all SaaS services would like to be in the leader quadrant if not the no. 1 spot. The challenge is that if your SaaS service is a niche product offering or a service that is expertise focused it can be extremely difficult to maintain and climb this 'ladder' effectively especially when past reviews are discounted negatively, despite the users and companies still actively using one's product.

benefits.text: What problems is the product solving and how is that benefiting you?
benefits.value: Providing us more market exposure via search and affiliation as well as the opportunity to benchmark our product against that of the industry we operate within.

The process is user friendly and gives us a great opportunity to respond to, and act on the feedback. The review moderation process is thorough, and integral to the credibility of the reviews, badges and rankings earned.

The Customer Success Team is awesome - always responsive and helpful. They provide great advice on better ways to use the platform, as well as the insights gained from the report data.

hate.text: What do you dislike about the product?

benefits.text: What problems is the product solving and how is that benefiting you?
benefits.value:
We value customer feedback and G2 gives our customers a reputable platform to share their feedback with us, and in doing so, with potential customers. This also gives us relevant insights on which areas to improve and build upon. This, in turn, has helped us build brand awareness and trust.

The widgets and badges for use on our site, and in marketing, have also been useful in adding extra credibility.

love.text: What do you like best about the product?

G2 stood out regarding team response, the information provided through the sales cycle, and the fact that it is all packaged together in one solution rather than pay-to-play. This option suits us better at this point. It's also easier to implement and get going with the review collection. I can't speak highly enough of Nathan and Jade, whom I work with on the G2 side - some of the best customer support I have experienced, and it's a joy to work with them. They share helpful tips and updates, which are really appreciated. That's what builds loyalty, and importantly they also deliver results!

hate.text: What do you dislike about the product?
hate.value: I have been using G2 for an entire quarter, and thus far, I am delighted with the solution and the team support. We are in the early stages of building our review strategy, but we already have seen plenty of reasons to continue building the relationship with G2.

benefits.text: What problems is the product solving and how is that benefiting you?
benefits.value: We had a gap in our marketing strategy when it came to reviews. We needed to focus on this to add social proof and externally verify the strength of our solution. We are also getting new insights we did not have access to before, informing future campaigns and sales activity.
